attributes.action: Close all education down to allow the virus to be controlled.
attributes.additional_details: No education is worth a life, education can be extended but life of an elderly person cannot close down education. Give the NHS the relief it needs as was done in the first wave.
attributes.background: Closing business will not stop the spread of the virus the only measure is to close down education. No child’s education is worth a life.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Require university campuses to close to stop the spread of COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552512
